name: Spicy Basil Chicken Stir-Fry
description: A quick and easy stir-fry with tender chicken, fresh basil, and spicy flavors. This dish is perfect for a weeknight dinner, combining the fragrant aroma of basil with the heat of chili peppers. Serve over steamed rice for a satisfying meal.

name: Mushroom and Spinach Stuffed Chicken
description: Juicy chicken breasts stuffed with a savory mixture of mushrooms, spinach, and cheese. This elegant dish is perfect for a dinner party or a special occasion. The creamy filling complements the tender chicken, creating a delightful combination of flavors.

name: Lemon Garlic Shrimp Pasta
description: A zesty and refreshing pasta dish featuring succulent shrimp, tangy lemon, and fragrant garlic. This recipe is perfect for seafood lovers, combining the flavors of the ocean with the brightness of citrus. Quick to make and full of flavor, it's a great option for a satisfying meal.
ingredients: 400 g large shrimp, peeled and deveined

name: Vegetarian Chickpea Curry
description: A comforting and aromatic curry filled with nutritious chickpeas and a blend of Indian spices. This vegetarian dish is hearty and satisfying, perfect for a cozy dinner on a chilly evening. Serve over steamed rice for a complete and wholesome meal.

name: Caprese Salad with Balsamic Glaze
description: A classic Italian salad featuring ripe tomatoes, fresh basil, and creamy mozzarella cheese drizzled with a sweet balsamic glaze. This salad is a celebration of summer flavors, perfect for a light lunch or appetizer. Simple yet elegant, it's sure to impress.

name: Teriyaki Salmon with Sesame Seeds
description: Delicious and healthy teriyaki-glazed salmon fillets sprinkled with sesame seeds. This recipe is a perfect balance of sweet and savory flavors, with tender salmon that flakes easily. Serve with steamed vegetables for a nutritious and satisfying meal.
